stories.Title: Starting fresh?
stories.Description: There's a good amount of radical changes happening at Google. First, layoffs due to cost-cutting efforts impact several divisions. Also, its famous Assistant is losing 17 features.
stories.Tweet: Starting fresh? 📦 There's a good amount of radical changes happening at Google. First, layoffs due to cost-cutting efforts impact several divisions. Also, its famous Assistant is losing 17 features. #google https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2024/01/google-lays-off-hundreds-more-employees-strips-google-assistant-features/

stories.Title: Get it while you can
stories.Description: Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo is alerting Apple enthusiasts, stating that the first batch of Apple's Vision Pro may be limited, so make sure you're prepared.
stories.Tweet: Get it while you can 📦 Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo is alerting Apple enthusiasts, stating that the first batch of Apple's Vision Pro may be limited, so make sure you're prepared. #apple https://www.cnbc.com/2024/01/11/apples-vision-pro-headset-will-be-in-short-supply-at-launch-kuo.html

stories.Title: Ready to change the scene
stories.Description: We live in the era of humanoid robots. If you're still skeptical, check out X1. This Norwegian startup secured $100 million in funding for its bipedal bot, with backing from OpenAI and Samsung.
stories.Tweet: Ready to change the scene 📦 We live in the era of humanoid robots. If you're still skeptical, check out X1. This Norwegian startup secured $100 million in funding for its bipedal bot, with backing from OpenAI and Samsung. #robotics https://venturebeat.com/ai/1x-robotic-startup-backed-by-openai-receives-100m-in-funding/

stories.Title: Mission accomplished
stories.Description: Months of work later, including the development of new tools, NASA has finally opened the canister containing the remains of asteroid Bennu. With the collection completed, great discoveries are coming.
stories.Tweet: Mission accomplished 📦 Months of work later, including the development of new tools, NASA has finally opened the canister containing the remains of asteroid Bennu. With the collection completed, great discoveries are coming. #NASA https://gizmodo.com/nasa-osiris-rex-bennu-asteroid-samples-canister-1851159732

stories.Title: A vintage touch
stories.Description: Scientists have stumbled upon a revelation that has a retro feel: data captured by Voyager in 1979 shows that Jupiter's magnetosheath is surrounded by "jets".
stories.Tweet: A vintage touch 📦 Scientists have stumbled upon a revelation that has a retro feel: data captured by Voyager in 1979 shows that Jupiter's magnetosheath is surrounded by "jets". #space https://gizmodo.com/nasa-voyager-plasma-jets-jupiter-magnetosphere-1851160380

stories.Title: Your pocket companion
stories.Description: Innovation and nostalgia make a great mix, and Rabbit's R1 is here to prove it. Its special design and power have caught the public's attention, selling 10,000 units on its launch day.
stories.Tweet: Your pocket companion 📦 Innovation and nostalgia make a great mix, and Rabbit's R1 is here to prove it. Its special design and power have caught the public's attention, selling 10,000 units on its launch day. #ai https://www.zdnet.com/article/rabbit-sells-10000-of-its-r1-ai-pocket-companions-in-one-day/

stories.Title: At your service
stories.Description: As Microsoft continues to invest in AI, the company aims to make Copilot readily available to its users at any time. That's why they're introducing automatic launch on widescreen devices at startup.
stories.Tweet: At your service 📦 As Microsoft continues to invest in AI, the company aims to make Copilot readily available to its users at any time. That's why they're introducing automatic launch on widescreen devices at startup. #microsoft https://www.theverge.com/2024/1/12/24035637/microsoft-windows-11-copilot-ai-chatbot-automatically-open-boot-startup

stories.Title: Gravity soars high
stories.Description: China is not taking a break from its goal of conquering space. OrienSpace is the recent star in its endeavors. The company successfully launched Gravity-1, a groundbreaking solid-fuel rocket.
stories.Tweet: Gravity soars high 📦 China is not taking a break from its goal of conquering space. OrienSpace is the recent star in its endeavors. The company successfully launched Gravity-1, a groundbreaking solid-fuel rocket. #rocketscience https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/worlds-most-powerful-solid-fuel-rocket-china

stories.Title: Looking for help
stories.Description: ESA is exploring alternative launch options for its Copernicus satellite due to persistent challenges with the Vega C and Ariane 6 rockets. SpaceX emerged as a silver lining in this situation.
stories.Tweet: Looking for help 📦 ESA is exploring alternative launch options for its Copernicus satellite due to persistent challenges with the Vega C and Ariane 6 rockets. SpaceX emerged as a silver lining in this situation. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/europe-considers-launching-copernicus-satellite-on-falcon-9/

stories.Title: Coming for Tesla
stories.Description: Toyota has announced the launch of solid-state EV batteries with fast charging and impressive ranges as the automaker strives to keep up with the ever-changing EV market.
stories.Tweet: Coming for Tesla 📦 Toyota has announced the launch of solid-state EV batteries with fast charging and impressive ranges as the automaker strives to keep up with the ever-changing EV market. #toyota https://electrek.co/2024/01/11/toyota-solid-state-ev-battery-plans-750-mi-range/

title: NASA unlocks Bennu, Rabbit's R1 defies expectations, ESA's alternative plan
description: Yay! So, after months of figuring out how to grab bits from asteroid Bennu without messing it up, NASA finally cracked open that canister. We were just chatting about it a few days ago, but Rabbit’s R1 is surely revolutionizing gadgets with an outstanding 10,000 units sold on its first day. Lastly, ESA is on the lookout for a helping hand to launch its space innovations, and who comes to the rescue? None other than SpaceX.
